stories.body: What’s the difference between a poorly dressed man on a tricycle and a well-dressed man on a bicycle? Attire!
stories.author: Wayne Gretzky

stories.body: Why do you never see elephants hiding in trees? Because they’re so good at it!
stories.author: Marie Curie

stories.body: How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together!
stories.author: Erwin Schrödinger

stories.body: Why did the old man fall in the well? Because he couldn’t see that well!
stories.author: John von Neumann

stories.body: To whoever stole my copy of Microsoft Office, I will find you. You have my Word!
stories.author: Robert Hooke
